Text:
Enjoy Mad Riders, repack by BlackBox. :)
Im seeding with my 150mbit/s server but i would be happy if you seed too! :)

Also, check blackbox website for verifying its real if you wonder.
http://blackboxrepack.com/mad-riders-black-box/

Just a reminder, when installation is complete, wait for the box that comes up to be finished before you press Finish.
And in that box, wait for it to say "Press any key to continue...".
Also dont forget, when starting the game with MadRidersGame_x86.exe, rightclick and run as admin.

Have fun! :)
Those Black Box rips don't work for me, everytime it freez on Installation! Also same happends with Max Payne 3.
Dosent work....crashes on startup without any error on Windows 7 even after that admin thing!!!!
works fine for me - win 7 x64
